summary: This document is a Credit Support Annex to a Master Agreement between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Financial, LLC, outlining the terms for credit support and collateral management. It details the obligations of both parties regarding the transfer of collateral, the rights of the secured party, and the conditions under which these obligations must be fulfilled.

persons.name: Deutsche Bank AG
persons.context: Deutsche Bank AG is identified as Party A in the agreement, responsible for receiving collateral.

persons.name: Southern Financial, LLC
persons.context: Southern Financial, LLC is identified as Party B in the agreement, responsible for providing collateral.

persons.name: Cynthia Cur
persons.context: Cynthia Cur is mentioned as a director signing on behalf of Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Kathleen Yohe
persons.context: Kathleen Yohe is mentioned as a director signing on behalf of Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Paul E. Salvas
persons.context: Paul E. Salvas is mentioned as a vice president signing on behalf of Deutsche Bank Securities, Inc.

persons.name: Thomas Hoddinott
persons.context: Thomas Hoddinott is mentioned as a director signing on behalf of Deutsche Bank Securities, Inc.

persons.name: Gedeon Pinedo
persons.context: Gedeon Pinedo is mentioned as the attention contact for Deutsche Bank AG.

connections.description: Deutsche Bank AG acts as the secured party while Southern Financial, LLC is the pledgor providing collateral.
Deutsche Bank Securities, Inc. operates as an intermediary for Deutsche Bank AG in managing the securities account.

events.title: Credit Support Annex Agreement
events.description: The Credit Support Annex was established between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Financial, LLC outlining collateral management terms.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3 St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The document outlines the terms for credit support and collateral management between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Financial, LLC.
Deutsche Bank AG is the secured party while Southern Financial, LLC is the pledgor providing collateral.
The agreement includes provisions for the management of a securities account and the rights of both parties regarding collateral.
Specific individuals from Deutsche Bank AG and its affiliates are named as signatories to the agreement.
The agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
